General.Name: Yunnan Baiyao Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Baiyao Group Co.,Ltd engages in the pharmaceutical business in China and internationally. It provides health products, drugs, medical instruments, and Chinese medicine resources. Yunnan Baiyao Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1902 and is based in Kunming, China.
General.Address: No. 3686, Yunnan Baiyao Street, Kunming, China, 650500
